original_title: Red Hot Chili Peppers: The Last Gang in Town
overview: This documentary features rare footage of the band, and photographs from private archives and numerous location shots showing the roots of the Chilis. This is the full story of how they formed and how they overcame terrible odds to finally achieve their goals - it's a tale of sex, drugs and rock n' roll like it's never been told before.
title: Red Hot Chili Peppers: The Last Gang in Town
